configurable.i18n_name: THE SKINNY SLIM ILLUSION LUXE COBALT BLUE
configurable.i18n_name_de: THE SKINNY SLIM ILLUSION LUXE COBALT BLUE
configurable.i18n_name_nl: THE SKINNY SLIM ILLUSION LUXE COBALT BLUE
configurable.i18n_name_fr: THE SKINNY SLIM ILLUSION LUXE COBALT BLUE
configurable.i18n_name_it: THE SKINNY SLIM ILLUSION LUXE COBALT BLUE
configurable.i18n_name_es: THE SKINNY SLIM ILLUSION LUXE COBALT BLUE
configurable.i18n_description: The Skinny in A very expensive brand’s slim illusion luxe denim is the definitive skinny fit jean. The luxe ultra stretch denim is created using innovative denim technology. These skinny fit women’s jeans in bright cobalt blue are an essential modern classic with a slimming fit that molds and moves with you.
configurable.i18n_description_de: The Skinny in A very expensive brands Slim Illusion Luxe-Denim ist die ultimative Skinny-Fit Jeans. Der luxuriöse, ultrastretchige Denim wird mit innovativer Denim-Technologie hergestellt. Diese Damenjeans in Skinny-Fit im Farbton hellem Kobaltblau sind ein unverzichtbarer moderner Klassiker mit schmeichelnder Passform und tragen sich wie eine zweite Haut.
configurable.i18n_description_nl: The Skinny in A very expensive brand's Slim illusion luxe denim biedt het beste wat je van een skinny fit kunt verwachten. Het mooie superelastische denim is met een innovatieve denimtechnologie vervaardigd. Deze kobaltblauwe vrouwenjeans is een essentiële moderne klassieker met een afkledende pasvorm die zich perfect aan het lichaam aanpast.
configurable.i18n_description_fr: Le Skinny en luxueux denim Slim Illusion de A very expensive brand est LE Skinny ultime. Confection utilisant une technologie innovante pour ce luxueux denim ultrastretch. Ce skinny bleu cobalt vif pour femme est une pièce tendance incontournable, sa coupe slim suit les mouvements du corps en beauté.
configurable.i18n_description_it: The Skinny di 7 For all Mankind, realizzato con il denim Slim Illusion Luxe è la quintessenza del jeans skinny più cool. Il lussuoso denim super stretch è realizzato usando un'innovativa tecnologia di produzione. Questo jeans skinny da donna, declinato in un'intensa tonalità blu cobalto, è un classico essenziale e moderno, con un fit che modella il fisico e accompagna il movimento.
configurable.i18n_description_es: El modelo Skinny confeccionado en denim Slim Illusion Luxe de A very expensive brand es el jean Skinny por excelencia. El magnífico denim ultra elástico se confecciona con una innovadora tecnología denim. Estos vaqueros para mujer de corte skinny en azul cobalto brillante se convierten en una prenda clásica y a la vez moderna esencial, con un calce que estiliza, se amolda al cuerpo y acompaña tus movimientos.

configurable.i18n_product_details:
• Measurements based on Size 27

  • Rise: Front: 7in
  • Leg opening: 10 1/2in
  • Measurements may vary based on size, fabric and wash
  • 50% Modal 41.5% Cotton 6% Polyester 2.5% Elastane
  • Made in Europe using original and handcrafted finishing techniques
